Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae Type B Antigen in Cerebrospinal Fluid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14321-4 Haemophilus influenzae B Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
    20486-7 Haemophilus influenzae B Ag [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    24010-1 Haemophilus influenzae B Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    6611-8 Haemophilus influenzae B Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
